unnormalised: Arre, AI haddun gheta? Ashench! Mhoji aaji azunui WhatsApp-ar "Good Morning" chitranna fuddem dhaddta, tika dista tem tika boreponnak poddta mhunn. Ekea article-an pollelem AI atam Bollywood-achim screenplay boroita mhunn. LOL! Mhaka dubav asa tem Salman Khan-achea nimannea cinema poros kitem-i borem haddunk xakta mhunn. Gambhirponnan pollounk gelear, 10 GB training data tem vearth ghal'lem, AI-in soddun dillem astolem!
normalised: Arê, A-I ghêta ghêtâ? As if! Mâji âji azû-ui W-hats-A-pp-ar "Good Morning" chitrâ dhâdtâ, tîk dishtâ ti tiâchê zdravî-khâtîr bôrê âsâ. Kashântari article vâchem A-I ätâm B-ollywood scripts barâyta mhontâ. L-O-L! Mhakâ dubav âsâ ti sâllânti S-alman K-han chitrâpätâ thavân bôrem kashêm tarihi âuntâ vê? Khârepunne sangtâ, dâh gigabyte training data tiêchê bhitor vâyt ghelem, A-I sodtâ vê mhunte dita!
